meta.label: Add ALB controller
meta.description: Add a controller on the cluster to create ingresses using ALB.

longDescription:
Note: the VPC subnets that the ALB instances will use need to be tagged with 

 * kubernetes.io/role/internal-elb → 1 

 * kubernetes.io/role/elb → 1

params.name: policyName
params.label: IAM policy
params.description: Name of a policy to use or create (default: ALBIngressControllerIAMPolicy)

params.name: tagSubnets
params.label: Tag subnets
params.description: Tag the subnets of this cluster's settings with kubernetes.io/role/{elb,internal-elb} (for clusters created by this plugin)
